title: Formation of the Super-Structures on the Inactive X
questions: How is a raw set of ChIP-seq data processed and analyzed?
Where are the enriched regions for H3K27me3, H3K4me3 and CTCF on the chrX?
objectives: Map reads on a reference genome
Assess the quality of a ChIP-seq experiment
key_points: ChIP-seq data requires multiple methods of quality assessment to ensure that the data is of high quality.
Multiple normalization methods exists depending on the availability of input data.
Heatmaps containing all genes of an organism can be easily plotted given a BED file and a coverage file.

workflows.name: GTN - ChIP Seq - Formation Of Super Structures On Xi
workflows.title: GTN - ChIP Seq - Formation Of Super Structures On Xi

history.message: Add licence and update author ids
Update ChIP-Seq tutorial with latest tool versions and links
Move chip-seq tutorials to epigenetics topic
